description: Adds or updates the specified tags for the specified log group. To list the tags for a log group, use ListTagsForResource. To remove tags, use UntagResource. For more information about tags, see Tag Log Groups in Amazon CloudWatch Logs in the Amazon CloudWatch Logs User Guide. CloudWatch Logs doesn't support IAM policies that prevent users from assigning specified tags to log groups using the aws:Resource/key-name or aws:TagKeys condition keys. For more information about using tags to control access, see Controlling access to Amazon Web Services resources using tags.

parameters.name: logGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the log group.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The key-value pairs to use for the tags. (string) --- (string) ---
